items.title: Records and the ‘with’ operator, redux

items.title: Records and Collections
items.contentSnippet: Records and Collections This post is to some extent a grab-bag of points of friction I’ve encountered when using records and collections within the election site. Records recap This may end up being the most generally useful blog post in this series.
